children.description:
I have retrieved information regarding the playlists on which the artist INNA is "discovered." Below are the details:

1. **Playlist Name**: **Summer Dance Hits 2024**
   - **Description**: The summer needs dance hits 😎☀️
   - **Cover Art**: [Link to cover art](https://i.scdn.co/image/ab67706f00000002c7ea8e62ee86671eaa4c341c)

2. **Playlist Name**: **Hits du Moment**
   - **Description**: GIMS au sommet de la première playlist de France.
   - **Cover Art**: [Link to cover art](https://i.scdn.co/image/ab67706f00000002406b5660d971369d321f2b92)

... and 87 more playlists feature songs discovered.
